question:
With respect to the milk production in India, consider the below observations:
  1. India is largest producer as well as consumer nation of the world
  2. India produced approximately 200 million tonnes of milk in a year currently
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: India continues to be the largest producer of milk in the world. [India is second largest consumer nation of milk after China]. Milk production in the country has increased from 146.3 million tonnes in 2014-15 to 198.4 million tonnes in 2019-20. Annual Growth Rate of milk production was 6.27 percent during 2014-15, thereafter, there was a steady increase. In 2019-20, milk production increased by 5.68 per cent as compared to the previous year.
